name: 3.0.0-M6
body:
<!-- Optional: add a release summary here -->
* [[MRELEASE-1096]](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/MRELEASE-1096) - Many cleanups and updates (#132) @nielsbasjes
* [[MRELEASE-1098]](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/MRELEASE-1098) - Drop o.a.m.shared.release.env.ReleaseEnvironment.getL… (#136) @michael-o

## 🚀 New features and improvements

* [[MRELEASE-1097]](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/MRELEASE-1097) - rework plugin output to clarify goal's phases (#135) @hboutemy
* [[MRELEASE-1091]](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/MRELEASE-1091) - Use non-interactive mode for forked Maven process (#125) @slawekjaranowski
* [[MRELEASE-1082]](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/MRELEASE-1082) - configuration option for using a shallow clone (#121) @BigMichi1

## 🐛 Bug Fixes

* [[MRELEASE-1022]](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/MRELEASE-1022) - Use versions defined in `release.properties` when doing `release:prepare` (#111) @sleberrigaud
* Fix xsd NS (#102) @pzygielo

## 📦 Dependency updates

* [[MRELEASE-1095]](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/MRELEASE-1095) - Upgrade Maven SCM to 1.13.0 (#131) @michael-o
* Bump plexus-utils from 3.4.1 to 3.4.2 (#128) @dependabot
* Bump slf4j-simple from 1.7.5 to 1.7.36 (#124) @dependabot
* [[MRELEASE-1087]](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/MRELEASE-1087) - Upgrade Maven to 3.2.5 (and de-plexus) (#118) @cstamas
* [[MRELEASE-1085]](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/MRELEASE-1085) - Upgrade Maven Invoker to 3.2.0 (#117) @slawekjaranowski
* [[MRELEASE-1086]](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/MRELEASE-1086) - Upgrade Parent to 36 (#116) @slawekjaranowski
* Bump plexus-interpolation from 1.17 to 1.26 (#107) @dependabot
* Bump maven-invoker-plugin from 3.2.0 to 3.2.2 (#99) @dependabot
* Bump jdom2 from 2.0.6 to 2.0.6.1 (#96) @dependabot
* Bump mrm-maven-plugin from 1.2.0 to 1.3.0 (#95) @dependabot

## 👻 Maintenance

* [[MRELEASE-1088]](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/MRELEASE-1088) - Remove parsing of CLI arguments (#120) @slawekjaranowski

## 🔧 Build

* add release drafter configuration (#112) @olamy

name: 3.0.0-M5
body:
## What's Changed
* Update rollback-release.apt by @sanlaville in https://github.com/apache/maven-release/pull/64
* Bump junit from 4.13.1 to 4.13.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/apache/maven-release/pull/67
* Bump scmVersion from 1.11.2 to 1.11.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/apache/maven-release/pull/70
* Bump plexus-cipher from 1.4 to 1.7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/apache/maven-release/pull/66
* Bump commons-lang3 from 3.7 to 3.12.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/apache/maven-release/pull/69
* [N/A] Fix spelling error in log message by @klaraward in https://github.com/apache/maven-release/pull/78
* Bump xmlunit-core from 2.6.4 to 2.8.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/apache/maven-release/pull/71
* Bump maven-plugin-plugin from 3.6.0 to 3.6.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/apache/maven-release/pull/73
* Remove unused formal parameters by @pzygielo in https://github.com/apache/maven-release/pull/88
* Change interface implemented by MavenArtifactVersion by @pzygielo in https://github.com/apache/maven-release/pull/89
* [MRELEASE-1075] Move CVS-based tests to Subversion or Git by @michael-o in https://github.com/apache/maven-release/pull/90
* [MRELEASE-1074] Upgrade Maven SCM to 1.12.2 by @michael-o in https://github.com/apache/maven-release/pull/91

## New Contributors
* @sanlaville made their first contribution in https://github.com/apache/maven-release/pull/64
* @klaraward made their first contribution in https://github.com/apache/maven-release/pull/78

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/apache/maven-release/compare/maven-release-3.0.0-M4...maven-release-3.0.0-M5

name: 3.0.0-M3
body:
## What's Changed
* [MRELEASE-982] correct log message by @elharo in https://github.com/apache/maven-release/pull/39
* [MRELEASE-919] avoid redirects by @elharo in https://github.com/apache/maven-release/pull/40
* update JDOM and JUnit by @elharo in https://github.com/apache/maven-release/pull/41
* update plexus-utils by @elharo in https://github.com/apache/maven-release/pull/42
* Revert "update plexus-utils (#42)" by @elharo in https://github.com/apache/maven-release/pull/46
* update plexus-interpolation 1.17 by @elharo in https://github.com/apache/maven-release/pull/44
* update commons-io 2.6 by @elharo in https://github.com/apache/maven-release/pull/43
* update xmlunit by @elharo in https://github.com/apache/maven-release/pull/47
* update plexus-utils to 3.0.18 by @elharo in https://github.com/apache/maven-release/pull/48
* Remove empty statements/semicolons by @pzygielo in https://github.com/apache/maven-release/pull/52
* [MRELEASE-1042] - releaseProfiles get overriden by activeProfiles by @bguerin in https://github.com/apache/maven-release/pull/50
* [MRELEASE-1045] Update mockito-core to 2.28.2 by @ian-lavallee in https://github.com/apache/maven-release/pull/53
* Ignore .checkstyle by @elharo in https://github.com/apache/maven-release/pull/54
* (doc) Correct preposition by @pzygielo in https://github.com/apache/maven-release/pull/57
* subject verb agreement by @elharo in https://github.com/apache/maven-release/pull/58
* (doc) Fix missing slash for closing tag in FAQs by @padyx in https://github.com/apache/maven-release/pull/63

## New Contributors
* @ian-lavallee made their first contribution in https://github.com/apache/maven-release/pull/53
* @padyx made their first contribution in https://github.com/apache/maven-release/pull/63

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/apache/maven-release/compare/maven-release-3.0.0-M2...maven-release-3.0.0-M3

name: 3.0.0-M2
body:
## What's Changed
* Fix for MRELEASE-835: Automatically resolve snapshot dependencies in release:prepare by @theit in https://github.com/apache/maven-release/pull/19
* [MRELEASE-1036] Fix JavaDoc for JDK 8 by @cchacin in https://github.com/apache/maven-release/pull/33
* [MRELEASE-1038] releaseProfiles get overriden by exec.pomFileName by @bguerin in https://github.com/apache/maven-release/pull/38
* fix: re-normalize all line endings by @cchacin in https://github.com/apache/maven-release/pull/34

## New Contributors
* @cchacin made their first contribution in https://github.com/apache/maven-release/pull/33

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/apache/maven-release/compare/maven-release-3.0.0-M1...maven-release-3.0.0-M2

name: 3.0.0-M1
body:
## What's Changed
* Fixes for [MRELEASE-1009] : by @theit in https://github.com/apache/maven-release/pull/21
* [MRELEASE-161] If there is more than one artifact with the same artifactId in dependencyManagement only the first one is updated by @andretadeu in https://github.com/apache/maven-release/pull/27
* [MRELEASE-985] Override snapshot dependencies from command line by @ptahchiev in https://github.com/apache/maven-release/pull/28
* remove extraneous commas by @elharo in https://github.com/apache/maven-release/pull/30
* [MRELEASE-1034] changed error to warn if tag is not present at rollback; fixed typos by @cquoss in https://github.com/apache/maven-release/pull/31

## New Contributors
* @andretadeu made their first contribution in https://github.com/apache/maven-release/pull/27
* @ptahchiev made their first contribution in https://github.com/apache/maven-release/pull/28
* @cquoss made their first contribution in https://github.com/apache/maven-release/pull/31

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/apache/maven-release/commits/maven-release-3.0.0-M1
